Small motes of yellow pollen rise up from the wildflowers around you and drift into your mouth. Your throat begins to scratch, forcing you to cough. Animated branches from the trees above suddenly reach down and clutch you around the waist, pulling you into their foliage. </font><font color="#7C89FA">---</font><font color="#009494"> v7388</font><font color="#7C89FA"> --- </font><font color="#808000"><span style="color: #808000; background: #000000">In the trees above fork in the mountain trail.</span></font><font color="#FFD700"><span style="color: #FFD700; background: #000000"> (v7388) </span></font><font color="#00BD00">Superimposed over this location, an ethereal forest reaches up to the sky.</font><font color="#009494"> The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. An orange candy slice lies here on the ground. His life mercifully ended, the bloodied body of a hideously deformed man lies here. Rthiaa, the illithoid child, stands here studying her surroundings.</font><font color="#00FFFF"> Ecclesiar Trello d'Shallyon, the Absent-minded is here. Father Balian Zayah, The Simple-Hearted is here. He wields a radiant symbol of love in his left hand. Druid Isedar Dekoven-Valente is here. He wields a mystic cudgel in his left hand and a golden sunburst shield in his right. Grand Inquisitor Inagin Alinari, Companion of the Blade towers here. He wields a rapier of the Holy Flame in each hand. Ceren Valtyros, the Earthen Ire towers here, shrouded. He wields a twisted staff in his left hand and a magic tome in his right. </font><font color="#7280FA">You see exits leading northeast, west, and up. </font><font color="#CACACA">Squirrels chitter madly but remain unseen in the trees. You are pelted by acorns that leave welts and bruises. Flying insects suddenly swarm you, covering you with tiny, painful stings. A bolt of whitest lightning streaks down from the heavens and engulfs you. A thin, prickly vine snakes its way down the mountainside to grotesquely twine its way through the side of the skull and out the left eye socket.
